item.title: SWN
item.description: score:-85 Chances: Significantly high institutional ownership implies Southwestern Energy’s stock price is sensitive to their actions and sentiments, providing a potential chance for substantial price movement. Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases have positively impacted Southwestern Energy’s Q4 earnings, indicating a chance for continued growth and profitability.
